data.message: Become better than all other social media!  Let's start seeing profile pictures and profile backgrounds that are super small video clips! 8)  Data would skyrocket, so maybe you wouldn't allow for mobile data!?  Thank You, and have a Great Year!

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Jacob. We're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have anymore suggestions please, let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Hailey
